# Annuities Genius

## Overview

| Field | Details |
|-------|---------|
| **Website** | [annuitiesgenius.com](https://annuitiesgenius.com/) |
| **Category** | Annuity Illustration & Comparison Software / Insurance Technology (InsurTech) |
| **Description** | Annuities Genius is a comprehensive annuity illustration and comparison platform designed for insurance producers and financial advisors. The platform provides end-to-end sales pipeline management from lead generation to e-application submission, featuring real-time annuity comparisons, carrier-like illustrations, compliance support, and client engagement tools. Founded by Agatha Global Tech LLC, the platform serves 10,000+ producers and has facilitated $350k+ average premium transactions. |

---

## Pricing Tiers

| Tier | Name | Cost | Key Features |
|------|------|------|--------------|
| **Starter** | Free Plan | **Free** (limited features) | Basic annuity comparisons, limited carriers, basic calculators |
| **Standard** | Professional | **Contact for pricing** | Full annuity database, advanced filters, carrier illustrations, compliance tools |
| **Enterprise** | Institutional | **Custom pricing** | Full platform access, API integrations, unlimited carriers, dedicated support |

**Notes on Pricing:**
- **Free trial available** - 14-day free trial with full access
- **Free plan available** - Limited features for exploration
- **No public pricing** - Contact sales for custom quotes
- **Target market:** Insurance producers, RIAs, broker-dealers
- **Platform stats:** 10,000+ producers, $350k+ average premium
- **No long-term contracts** - Cancel anytime, pause subscription

---

## Key Features

### Core Capabilities
- **Annuity Comparison Engine** - Compare 100+ carriers across 2,000+ annuity products
- **Real-Time Illustrations** - Carrier-like illustrations with one-click generation
- **Lead Capture & Engagement** - Automated webinars and lead generation tools
- **Needs Discovery** - Interactive questionnaires for client goal identification
- **Compliance Support** - Reg BI compliant documentation and record-keeping
- **E-Application Submission** - Submit applications directly to carriers

### Advanced Features
- **Powerful Filters** - Filter by performance, fees, riders, company rating, income, growth, surrender charges
- **Interactive Questionnaires** - Shareable client-facing assessments
- **Compliance Tracking** - Fiduciary-ready documentation and audit trails
- **Client Portal** - Collaborative tools for Zoom and in-person meetings
- **Educational Content** - Automated webinars and educational materials

### Enterprise-Only Features
- **Distributor Tools** - Track and coach producers in real-time
- **Financial Institution Controls** - Product shelf management, compliance monitoring
- **Carrier Intelligence** - Distribution analytics and field engagement tools
- **API Access** - Custom integrations with proprietary systems
- **White-Label Options** - Platform branding for larger organizations

---

## Add-On Products & Services

### Lead Generation Suite
**What it does:** Automated lead capture and educational webinar system

**Key Features:**
- Personalized annuity websites with live rates
- Automated webinar delivery
- Lead nurturing workflows
- Educational content library

**Pricing:** Included in platform access (webinar hosting may have additional fees)

**Use Cases:**
- Advisors seeking to fill pipeline with qualified leads
- Practices wanting automated prospect education
- Firms building annuity-focused marketing funnels

### Compliance & Documentation
**What it does:** Reg BI compliant documentation and record-keeping

**Key Features:**
- Automated compliance tracking
- Deep research documentation
- Audit-ready record-keeping
- Best Interest Standard documentation

**Pricing:** Included in platform access

**Use Cases:**
- Advisors subject to Regulation Best Interest
- Firms with compliance requirements
- Practices needing audit trails

### E-Application & Submission
**What it does:** Electronic application submission to carriers

**Key Features:**
- Direct carrier submission
- Data pre-population
- Status tracking
- Document management

**Pricing:** Included in platform access

**Use Cases:**
- Advisors wanting to streamline application process
- Practices with high annuity volume
- Firms seeking faster policy issuance

---

## Integration Overview

**Total Integrations:** CRM systems, carrier platforms, compliance tools

**Integration Types:**
- Native integrations (carrier connections)
- API-based (custom integrations)
- Third-party (CRM platforms)
- Export capabilities (document and data export)

**Key Integration Categories:**
- Carrier Platforms
- CRM Systems
- Compliance Tools
- Document Management
- Marketing Automation

### Key Integrations

#### 1. Carrier Platform Integrations
**Type:** Native integration (direct carrier connections)  
**Direction:** One-way (application submission)  
**What it does:** Direct connection to 100+ annuity carriers for real-time rates and e-application submission  
**Data Synced:** Product rates, illustration data, application forms, policy status  
**Setup Complexity:** Easy (pre-configured carrier connections)  
**Limitations:** Carrier participation may vary  
**Documentation:** Available through platform

#### 2. CRM Integration
**Type:** API-based  
**Direction:** Bi-directional  
**What it does:** Sync client data and annuity transactions with CRM systems  
**Data Synced:** Client profiles, interaction history, policy data, commission tracking  
**Setup Complexity:** Medium (requires CRM API access)  
**Limitations:** CRM must support API integrations  
**Documentation:** Available through platform documentation

#### 3. Compliance Tool Integration
**Type:** Third-party integration  
**Direction:** One-way (data export)  
**What it does:** Export compliance documentation to compliance management systems  
**Data Synced:** Audit trails, compliance documentation, Reg BI records  
**Setup Complexity:** Medium (requires compliance tool subscription)  
**Limitations:** Separate compliance platform required  
**Documentation:** Available through compliance tool provider

#### 4. Document Management Integration
**Type:** Third-party integration  
**Direction:** One-way (document export)  
**What it does:** Export documents to document management systems  
**Data Synced:** Application forms, illustrations, compliance documents  
**Setup Complexity:** Easy (standard document export)  
**Limitations:** Requires document management system  
**Documentation:** Available through platform

#### 5. Marketing Automation Integration
**Type:** Third-party integration  
**Direction:** One-way (lead data export)  
**What it does:** Export lead data to marketing automation platforms  
**Data Synced:** Lead information, engagement data, webinar attendance  
**Setup Complexity:** Medium (requires marketing platform)  
**Limitations:** Requires marketing automation subscription  
**Documentation:** Available through platform

#### 6. Custom API Integration
**Type:** REST API  
**Direction:** Bi-directional  
**What it does:** Custom integrations with proprietary systems  
**Data Synced:** Full data access based on permissions  
**Setup Complexity:** Hard (requires development)  
**Limitations:** Enterprise tier required  
**Documentation:** Available through enterprise sales

---

## Integration Types Available

- **Native integrations:** Direct carrier connections for rates and applications
- **API:** Custom API for enterprise clients
- **Webhook:** Available for real-time notifications
- **Third-party:** CRM, compliance tools, document management, marketing automation
- **Export:** Standard document and data export capabilities

## API & Developer Info

**API Availability:** Yes (Enterprise tier)

**Developer Portal:** Available through enterprise sales contact

**Authentication Methods:**
- API keys for custom integrations
- OAuth 2.0 for third-party apps
- SSO for platform access

**Rate Limits:** Not publicly disclosed (contact for enterprise limits)

**API Documentation:** Available upon enterprise agreement

**Webhook Support:** Yes for real-time notifications (policy status, lead updates)

**API Cost:** Included in enterprise pricing (no separate API fees)

## Evaluation Notes

### Pros (5+ items)
1. **End-to-End Platform** - Complete sales pipeline from lead to e-application
2. **Real-Time Illustrations** - Carrier-like illustrations with one-click generation
3. **100+ Carriers** - Comprehensive annuity product database
4. **Compliance Support** - Reg BI compliant documentation built-in
5. **Lead Generation Tools** - Automated webinars and lead capture
6. **Proven Results** - $350k+ average premium, 10,000+ producers
7. **Free Trial Available** - 14-day free trial with full access
8. **Flexible Subscription** - No long-term contracts, pause anytime

### Cons (4+ items)
1. **No Public Pricing** - Requires sales contact for quotes
2. **Annuity-Focused** - Limited to annuity products only
3. **Enterprise Features Limited** - Advanced features require enterprise tier
4. **API Access Limited** - Full API only available in enterprise tier
5. **Learning Curve** - Comprehensive platform requires training
6. **Dependent on Carriers** - Product availability depends on carrier participation

### Alternatives
- **Annuity Rate Watch:** Competitor annuity comparison platform
- **FIDx (Fidelity Investments):** Annuity illustration and compliance tools
- **AnnuityFYI:** Annuity rate comparison tool
- **RateWatch:** Annuity rate monitoring platform
- **Custom Broker-Dealer Platforms:** Proprietary annuity systems

### Use Cases

**Ideal For:**
- Insurance producers focused on annuity sales
- RIAs incorporating annuities into retirement planning
- Broker-dealers seeking annuity platform for advisors
- Advisors wanting streamlined annuity illustration process
- Practices needing compliance documentation for Reg BI
- Firms looking to scale annuity production

**Not Ideal For:**
- Advisors seeking multi-asset class planning tools
- Firms not selling annuities
- Practices requiring non-annuity investment products
- Advisors needing standalone CRM (requires integration)
- Very small practices with minimal annuity volume

### Key Differentiators

1. **Complete Sales Pipeline** - End-to-end from lead generation to e-application
2. **Real-Time Carrier Illustrations** - Instant, carrier-ready illustrations
3. **Compliance-First Design** - Reg BI compliant by design
4. **Lead Generation Tools** - Automated webinars and educational content
5. **100+ Carrier Database** - Comprehensive annuity product access
6. **Proven ROI** - Track record of increased production (50% avg increase reported)
